name: Easy, Speedy Corn Muffins
author: Marcy
summary: This is a very moist, made-in-minutes corn muffin with a hint of sweetness. The batter can also be baked in a 13x9 pan for approximately 40 minutes to make corn bread.
ingredients: 2 (8.5 ounce) packages dry corn muffin mix
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Lightly grease the bottoms only of 12 muffin cups, or line with baking cups
Place the eggs in a large bowl, and beat until light colored
Stir in the canned corn and sugar until well blended
Add the muffin mixes, and stir just until dry ingredients are moistened
Bake in preheated oven until toothpick inserted in center of a muffin comes out clean, 16 to 22 minutes
Cool 5 minutes in pan, then turn out on a rack
